DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is (1) to examine whether the left ventricular function is impaired in women with preeclampsia relative to healthy pregnant controls, (2) to examine whether the endothelial function is impaired in women with preeclampsia relative to healthy pregnant controls, and (3) to examine whether there is a post partum impairment in left ventricular and endothelial function.
DOC.brief_title: Left Ventricular and Endothelial Function in Preeclampsia
DOC.criteria: >18 years of age Case: Clinical diagnosis of preeclampsia, Control: Systolic BP <140 mmHg and diastolic BP <90 mmHg Known hypertension or other cardiovascular disease Diabetes/gestational diabetes Multiple gestation
